text: NGC 163 is an elliptical galaxy in the constellation Cetus. It was discovered by William Herschel since 1890. It has been found in a faint object but when seeing using an optical telescope was an elliptical galaxy that ranges up to 13 magnitude. ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== * Category:Cetus (constellation) Category:Elliptical galaxies 0163 002149
title: NGC 163
